cfmongodb.components
Class Document

railo-context.Component
        cfmongodb.components.Document

public class Document

extends railo-context.Component

Default implementation of IDocument and used by the Mongo class to generate a document.

Constructor Summary
init(string collection_name, [any _mongo='[runtime expression]'])
          Constructor. Creates an instance of a MongoDocument.

 any update([any property], [any value])
          Performs in-place update of the the value for 'property'. NOT IMPLEMENTED
 void validate()
          Should be called before save() to perform any required validation. NOT IMPLEMENTED
 
Methods inherited from class railo-context.Component
 

Constructor Detail

init

public init(string collection_name, [any _mongo='[runtime expression]'])
Constructor. Creates an instance of a MongoDocument.

Parameters:
collection_name - The name of the collection to which this document is bound.
_mongo - The instance of the Mongo wrapper to which the document is bound.
